examples: It's too expensive and anyway the colour doesn't suit you.
Es demasiado caro y de todos modos el color no te queda bien.
We're not perfect, but it doesn't really matter anyway.
No somos perfectos, pero de todos modos no importa.
De todos modos, ahora es demasiado tarde.
It's going to happen anyway, so we won't object to it.
Va a suceder de todos modos, así que no nos oponeremos.
